alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 6:57AM CDT until June 18 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT FOR UNION AND NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN PARISHES... At 656 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Cooley to near Farmerville to 9 miles southeast of Bernice, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Farmerville, Dubach, Marion, Spearsville, D Arbonne, Loch Lomon, Spencer, Oakland, Haile, Linville, Taylorville, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Rocky Branch, Cecil, Shiloh, Unionville and Litroe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
